author: Peter Yeung in Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo
title: Three new Ebola cases detected in Democratic Republic of the Congo
description: Fresh cases of Ebola have been detected just days before the deadly epidemic in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo was to be declared over
content:
By Peter Yeung in Goma, Democratic Republic of Congo
Democratic Republic of the Congo isn’t yet free from Ebola
Sally Hayden/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
Fresh cases of Ebola have been detected just days before the deadly epidemic in eastern De… [+2949 chars]
